entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add keyboard shortcut for "Add null checks" in Generate Constructor refactor #75320
  • Consider deriving `DiagnosticsPass` from `BoundTreeWalkerWithStackGuardWithoutRecursionOnTheLeftOfBinaryOperator`. #75319
    17.13
  • Pattern match condition in ternary resulting in collection expression fails to parse; ternary appears to be mis-parsed as nullability modifier #75318
  • "Field is never assigned" warning inconsistent for ref fields #75315
    17.13

Closed

  • Broken NGEN in 4.13 #75323
  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` thrown in `LocalBinderFactory` compiling `ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic()` on MacOS #73439
    17.12
  • EnC: support moving fields and properties #69247
  • [Bug]: Building a .NET Core Function SDK 8.0.201 on a MAC with M1 chip #72393
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35401.07 #75313
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35330.119 #75310
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35330.159 #75309

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection in conditional expressions #75328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make types in Workspace layer sealed #75321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow OmniSharp to provide ImplementType Options #75312
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2550415 #75327
    auto-merge
  • Improve error reporting when reading bad metadata during EnC #75304
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert the Revert "Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs (#75172)" (#75279) #75324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • PR feedback on "use collection expression". #75303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • EnC: Allow reordering members #75257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Fixes comparison of VB XML literals #75301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update insertion model after VS snap #75295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
